title: Boards profile not updating?
body:
Hey y'all, so I was just wondering why when I click "boards profile" it says I have 28 lifetime upvotes , and my match history is from 2014 ?

Is there a way to update this or can you (Riot) personally update this for me? 

Just kind of annoying :/

replies.body: lol thanks and I wish you did

Your name is kind of popular, so some wires may have gotten criss-crossed.  :P  We booped your account, so everything should be in-sync now.  

P.S.  I was really torn between posting an NSync or Linkin Park meme.
